title: Rider transfer ticker: Bennett switches UAE for Israel-Premier Tech, Oomen to Lidl-Trek,  Welsford trades DSM for Bora-Hansgrohe
content:
Follow all the main moves of the 2023 'transfer window' for the men's and women's pelotons.

Read the full article at Rider transfer ticker: Bennett switches UAE for Israel-Premier Tech, Oomen to Lidl-Trek, Welsford trades DSM for Bora-Hansgrohe on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
